item.title: Deploying a serverless web analytics solution for your websites
item.description: Update, August 1st I have been running this project for five weeks now, so have a better understanding of costs. My bill in July was $0.85, and I suspect this will be reasonably stable over the coming months. I think this represents great value! I will report back at the end of the year and update this Like many folk, I run a personal blog. This blog runs Hugo and turns my markdown pages into static content, which I then deploy on Netlify.
